Convolutional neural network (CNN) is a special architecture of arti ﬁ cial neural networks and the best performing model to classify im- ages. It is divided into two main parts, Convolutional layers and fully connected layers. The convolutional layer is the building block of CNN, it is responsible for features extraction from images by applying convolu- tion  ﬁ ltering operations. However, the fully connected layers are responsible for the prediction part. With one or more fully connected layer
